WRITING.TITLE: Books to recommend about Second Sino Japanese War?
WRITING.TEXT: I am putting together an extended essay on the topic of "TO what extent did the second Sino Japanese War of 1937-45 contribute to the establishment of the People's republic of China in 1949?" I have been collecting sources, yet all I find are books covering the entire Chinese revolution. Would be appreciated if any historians help me out by recommending a book or anything helpful! Thanks.

WRITING.TITLE: About Summer Corrin
WRITING.TEXT: So, I love Corrin, and is trying to get another one so I can merge her up. However, I feel a bit disappointed by her being completely(?) powercrept by Camilla in every stat that is not resistance. Granted, it isn't THAT much of a bad tradeoff...that 7 resistance can allow her to take a hit from dragons and mages much better than Camilla, and allows her to enter desperation zone more reliably. Then again, Camilla has higher HP. I will never use Camilla because I am loyal to Corrin, but I want to hear some opinions about this.
But on Camilla, they'll target her lower res.
I 100% agree with this. The annoyance was there for a bit but in the end, I'll always use my favorite characters.
I no more money for you. I now use the Alm.
I do have Twitter and Tumblr, if you are interested. Links: https://twitter.com/yrfreakyneighbr https://www.tumblr.com/blog/yourfreakyneighbourh

Attached is an image of a mantis I recently found, refusing to leave my house. My terrarium has a good amount of mites in it, so I decided to let it loose inside for a bit. Anyone here kept mantis' in terrariums before? Any advice?

So this build is meant to make Eirika support her allies, whilst at the same time being able to dish out some punishment. I used to run TA swordbreaker, but changed up the build after looking intently at Brazen Attack/Speed. Desperation is there to kill frail opponents. After they hit Eirika. Assuming Eirika is in brazen range, and is copying her buffs to her allies, she gets +11 to both attack and speed, and potentially +4 to both defense and res, making her surprisngly tanky. I would give her Aether, but I'm out of Chrom. So, Galeforce would have to suffice for now. Moonbow is infinitely better, but I want my arena score. Of course, she isn't the best at combat, but I tried to make her hit as hard as possible if she has to. Any other Eirika users here? I would love to see your builds. And yes, she is at a measly +2 now, but I definitely will try my best to +10 her. Not enough copies...

Haha, you're right. She can barely scratch a lot of armors and dragons. Anything that is bulky basically (eg. Zelgius, Tiki). With TA, she kills Hector and Grima more easily, but with this build she can tank hits from certain glass canons, like Lucina and Marth, then hit them back hard.
Default female Robin has art that absolutely does nto fit. F!Grima and S!Robin, however, look great, amazing, even. Alm and Celica both look amazing. And I absolutely love both of F!Corrin's art.

Finishing off a WIP for a while now. Appreciation for one of my favorite characters in FE. I based her armour design off her original SS appearance and her other cipher artworks. Also, I only notice I made her left handed after the fact. The pose looks cooler this way, lol.
I just finished Eirika's route in SS, and I really liked it. So I drew this.
I have a tumblr and twitter. And also instagram. Just search my username and they should pop up!

I disagree. I think its incredibly cool how we get to use the villains in this game. I mean, even though I got spoiled for Celica, it didn't ruin Echoes for me. It still has some of the best storytelling I've seen in FE. I'd be all for taking control of some of my favorite villains. Hell, seeing some of these "spoilers" actually made me WANT to go try the games. (e.g. Zelgius)

That was my initial thoughts; however, do take into account the fact that: 1) Grima is colorless, so she and Tiki perform different roles. 2) Legendary stat boosts from Grima 3) Dragonskin Sure, Tiki has more stats, but the above set them apart. I was really annoyed by Y!Tiki powercreeping her at first, but in the end, I think it works out (somewhat). I also like Grima much more than Tiki, so there's that
A fellow Corrin enthusiast, I see. Friend request has been sent! Personally working on a Corrin myself, only at +4, though. Need more copies...
Your comics are great! Keep it up.
Thanks! Glad to hear this.

WRITING.TITLE: Julius as Horse Emblem Check
WRITING.TEXT: I was getting frustrated by Horse emblem breaking my streaks; The combo of Cecilia and Reinhardt (to a lesser extent, Lyn) has screwed me over countless times. So I looked around, and noticed Julius can tank Reinhardt pretty well, and easily break Cecilia. With bowbreaker, I imagine that he'd be able to tank Lyn as well. So I think he will be my next 5*, perhaps. Any Julius users can prove this?

Which is why its so annoying. Its always Lyn, Reinhardt and Cecilia; I'm sick of seeing them, especially as a combo. It completely rips apart my team (Celica, F!Corrin, F!Grima, Eirika) and just honestly takes the fun out of it. I mean, M!Grima works to a certain extent, but generally crumbles under the pressure of Cecilia AND Reinhardt. Any other unit that can handle two, if not all three?

Hmmm. So, green mages with Gronnraven can handle horse teams well, I assume. Would Boey, Soren or Female Robin be a good choice, I wonder? I doubt Nino has the doubt to survive the horsemen, even with TA.

Hmmm. I'm actually looking at my barracks, and eyeing my Brave Ike intently. Granted, he cannot attack against Cecilia and Reinhardt, but if I position him correctly, he cannot die to any attack from them (Beorc's blessing). Regardless, thanks for the suggestions; these will certainly be a consideration next season.
Oh no, she gets absolutely destroyed by TA Gronnraven Cecilia, and also Reinhardt. She one rounds B!Lyn easily with fortify dragons up, though. Definitely one of my favorite units.

DD certainly sounds like a fun idea. I will definitely be using that to try and counter Reinhardt. That res superboon sounds super good, but mine is +speed, which works to her advantage too. Thanks for the suggestions.
My spoils from the summer banner!
My spoils from the summer banner!

WRITING.TITLE: Budget Fir Builds
WRITING.TEXT: So I tried out building a Fir with optimal skill sets on my alt. (Warding breath, Wrath and such) I really, really like how she performed, and would like to use her on my main too. Problem is, I don't have the fodder for her. So no wrath, no Warding breath. I'm wondering if she will still be good without these premium skills. Granted, nameless blade is still fantastic, so I would still want to build her up. Any ideas?

Wow, I did not know Nameless paired well with Blazing Wind. Will definitely consider. FUry desperation seems to be the go-to choice here. Will probably run that until I get DC and wrath. Thanks for the in-depth analysis!
This is quite funny as a mandarin speaker. What country are you from?
I see you have a merged up Grima, as well. Great tastes, my friend.

Haha I don't tend to use it online, mainly for family and stuff, but I would consider myself fluent. Mandarin is the most common language on earth, after all, but can say that I didn't expect to find it here of all places ^^
I know that one day, Corrin will get this alt. And when she does, my wallet will die. Save me.

Even though fates had a bad plot and Corrin acted stupid as hell, I still ended up loving her design and character. Being my main in smash and a great unit in heroes certainly helped. Thus, I decided to draw her Nohr Noble outfit.
What really got me was the Knights having butt windows, too. Why??! You're a knight! You're supposed to be in heavy armour!
If you are interested, I am available on Tumblr, Instagram and Twitter. Just search my name and it should pop up.
Fir with Nameless Blade can dish out a ton of damage.
Haha, don't know about Katarina, but Fir is slept on way too much. With Nameless wrath her damage easilt matches Karla, just with more res and less speed.
I don't get why people hate alts so much, and I found the Grimas to be an incredibly fresh concept. Zelgius was also really cool, with his lines showing how much he has developed from PoR to RD.

Fates' gameplay was a step above many of the others. FE6 and 7, and to an extent Sacred Stones made me bored to death at times. Awakening had super easy gameplay. Whilst Birthright's gameplay was kinda boring as well, Conquest easily has the best gameplay in the franchise that I have tried. The maps were challenging, and beating them made me feel super accomplished. And also, despite its major flaws, I liked certain parts of Conquest's story. And of course IS would have a bias for Fates. It is their best selling game and the one with the most widespread appeal. Though as someone who started with Awakening, I would love to see more characters from the old games.
A quick sketch of Fir, who I hope to pull copies for on the free daily summons. Pls IS give me Fir.

Due to FEH, I went and read all of her supports, and by extension, Fir, Bartre, and Karel's supports as well. Gonna play through Blazing Blade for them :)))

Is this meme still a thing? I had extreme artists' block, and saw some people doing this challenge, and thought that I might try it if I get an interesting combination. And when I got Ishtar swapping with Summer Leo... I just couldn't resist doing something stupid like this.

Haha, even if you go to an art school, the development of your technique is largely independent. I do go to one, but they don't really teach you specifically on illustration. For that, I have to practice on my own. Thanks, btw.
Haha, I know that feeling all too well. If you feel like it, just do it. I would love to see your art.

Same here! I can't wait to get everything over and done with, then I can finally draw without stress ^^. Will be able to work more on your stuff too! Expect an update later this week, haha.
Beautiful!
I'm stuck at 4.... for BOTH Fir and Eirika. Damn it.
Yeah. How in the hell is FE in any way a Waifu simulator? S Supports are a minor part of the game, and the strategy and team building is still the main focus.

I definitely see more of the latter in the FE community, who refuse to see anything good in the new games, and speak as if their precious FE has been defiled since FE13. That much is just, frankly, untrue. Fire Emblem has kept its core aspects in mind, and FE13 and 14 still feel like very much part of the FE franchise, just, as you said, in a different direction. Although I started with 13 and 14, I would love to see something more akin to Echoes and Tellius being done in the future. Haha, those complaining about FE becoming too mainstream is hilarious, I loved the salt storm generated by Roy and Corrin joining smash; can't wait for even more FE reps in smash myself.
Takumi is a pretty good villain, I like him much, much more as a villain than as an ally.
I just spent $40 trying to get Wrath on Fir and failing. feelsbadman. If IS releases any alt of Fir, however, I will have to spend much more than that...
I JUST PULLED HER! In the end, it cost me $60, but hey, I consider myself fortunate I wasn't pity broken. Now I can finally get wrath on her! (After I cap out Neph's HM, of course.)

Ah yes, I have a +5 Fir right now! Here's her build as of now: \+spd -def **Nameless Blade** **Glacies** **Fury 3** **Desperation** **Spd Ploy** I am debating whether to replace desperation with wrath now that I have it, but it will take some determination, as it did take me $60 to get Nephenee...
Ah, I didn't mention, she has the flashing blade seal, to ensure Iceberg procs when she is in desperation range. +atk is also a worthy consideration, though her speed can be somewhat lacking.

Beginning to understand that feeling. I don't have a credit card linked for good reason, but on average I already shell out around $60 a month. Shouldn't continue down this path as I fear it will take my enjoyment away from the game, so I certainly need some self restraint as well.
Wait a second. Is your Bridal Marth running Distant Counter? I ran into this exact team yesterday.
Beautiful build, am thinking about trying a budget Selena build one day.

You gave me some great ideas, friend. Now if only I could summon just three more copies! Then, Joshua is up on the altar for that delicious windsweep build... And about that PRF, YES PLEASE! I really want her to get one, since Tiki got one, and she was already a strong unit.

Corrin is my main unit, she eats L!Lucina. With her amazing defense and speed you should have no issue with her. Just give her QR seal or skill and you'll be fine. L!Lucina is not unfair and has not given me any issues.

WRITING.TITLE: How it feels like to use Alfonse this season

WRITING.TEXT: Rinea by Hidari would break me.
I like Ike.
Curious as to who I am? You're better off not knowing. Or perhaps, even asking....

Actually, [I'm a dude](https://www.reddit.com/r/FireEmblemHeroes/comments/82oyja/the_lustful_summoner/), haha. I only drew a female summoner as it fit the situation much much more. (Although it does reflect a friend of mine who plays FEH.) Male physique is super tricky though, had to study multiple buff men to get it to a point of satisfaction.
I certainly looked up some body builders, you got me there! Honestly they make for the best references.
Beautiful.
Hmm. I draw both quite often so I don't really have a preference; both present their own set of challenges.
Exactly! She looks great and Hidari is finally in heroes. I especially love her damaged art

So, I often see people say that F!Grima is an underwhelming unit, such as how she isn't bulky enough, and that she got powercrept by Y!Tiki upon release. That is **WRONG.** #8203; F!Grima has incredible, colorless magical offensive stats. When paired with player phase skills, she becomes a rather strong melee Nuke that can kill lots of threats, even ones I thought would not be possible, such as Nowi and Myyrh. It is also worthy to note that she still possesses a decent amount of bulk. I usually run her with other Corrin, who also runs fortify dragons, to patch this up. Now then, onto the build. #8203; Slot A: Life and Death, gives her great offensive stats. 56/46 is just really fantastic. Slot B: I usually run desperation to OHKO Nowis when I take a hit. However, Wings of Mercy can really help if I use her on defense. Slot C: Res Smoke or Fortify Dragons are both great. Also can consider skills like Odd Atk Wave or Even Spd Wave. Sacred Seal: Heavy Blade. Allows for quick Aether activations, or bonfire, if you want faster kills. #8203; #8203;

No other unit can do colorless magical melee damage, and I love that about her. Very unique role, and if I wanna tank, I just switch to Dragonskin, boom. Haha, I have a +1 Alm, but I never did summoner support him. Alm does not need the stats to destroy +10 Effies.
You see, I would love to do that, once I am done with +10'ing Corrin... She won't come home, and I am stuck at +7. UGhHhHh
A sketch of Julia that I decided to tighten up. I actually really like Julia, and hope for a refine so she can reliably kill dragons.

I have exams tomorrow, and here I am. Oh well. This was a quick sketch that escalated far and beyond, but I cannot spend anymore time working on this, lest I want to fail, thus, the unrefined edges. Regardless, I enjoyed the idea, and I really hope Alm wins CYL 3.
I read that like BK's "Know your place" quote...
I could be buying something else, mainly.

WRITING.TITLE: If the Legendary Hero is Corrin...
WRITING.TEXT: ...I will 5* and fully build an Odin Dark. Corrin is the legendary hero I want the most, and I've talked about saving orbs for her for the longest time. However, as of this moment I have 24 orbs. I would have failed if the Legendary hero truly is Corrin. Thus, I will atone to my sins by building Odin.
Highly unlikely that its male, unless IS breaks the gender pattern.
You won't be disappointed. I have my 20k feathers and fodder ready.
I'd pull for her too, but I'd be *somewhat* fine with not getting her.
Yeah, haha! My orbs, too, somewhat.
If Boyd comes, I will whale...

WRITING.TITLE: How it feels like using Legendary Marth

WRITING.TEXT: I love running into Dragon emblem with L!Marth...watching him proc Faia Emuburemu on Tiki hurts a little bit, though.
MY DARKNESS WAS DARKER THAN YOURS!
Bartre.

WRITING.TITLE: When you forget about Warp Power

WRITING.TEXT: Happens way too often for my own good.
Oops!
Or Micaiah. I like how well they pair together.
This is a reminder to myself. I must do it.

Hahaha, I have to say, I much prefer a threatening Grima to the headcanons the fandom has built around them, though I don't mind them. This is THE Fell Dragon, after all. Their lore in SoV really made me like them as a character so much more.

These tears are blowing in the wind. When I get unproductive on my other work, I start drawing stupid things like this. I am very thankful to Fire Emblem for helping me get through artist's block...now then, I have to stop procrastinating.

Set aside around 40 minutes to make a quick sketch celebrating my man Ike taking round one! I recently started playing Tellius, and I'm really liking Ike as a character. Thank god I didn't fodder my free pick Ike for Steady Breath, even now he's still a beast for me.
I was certainly very mad at myself for losing Mordecai and Lethe.... God damn it, I didn't know that they be lost should they die as allies.
P-please don't spoil who the Black Knight is for me! I've got no clue!
Man, I thought they'd join later on, and I only found out that I screwed up when I had to recruit Zihark. This is possibly my biggest failure in my FE playing career.

I liked her in Awakening. But in heroes, literally every other arena match I find one with the same Steady breath Quick Riposte/Vantage build. It's so boring but she's so god damn effective. She constantly survives against Soren and even Julia for me, ruining my AA runs. She's the reason I invest so much into Alm and L!Marth. And I also send home every copy of her for the feathers after foddering one of her for LB onto my Corrin.
More copies of her is welcome, too. Been stuck at +5 forever.
Was tempted to summon, and spent 9 orbs in an attempt for EChrom. But I must stay strong, and save the rest of my orbs for F!Grima... this sketch is a reminder. Must... control.... orb hand....
Another sketch. Will people complain if this alt gets released? Personally I'd really want Robin to finally wield the Levin Sword. Oh well, but people complain at everything, soo...

GOD DAMN IT IS! I save Orbs for the first time since I started playing and you add the one character I want! (Not counting Benny, Charlotte, Mycen and Rudolf) I really am at a loss, whether to summon now, or to wait for her to return on another banner so I don't end up pulling Silas...
I should be in luck as they'd likely be free units.

The sheer fact that I could pull a Silas instead is enough to turn me off. I don't hate Silas, but I vastly prefer Ophelia to Silas. I guess I shall wait for the "Heroes with Chill skills" banner instead.
I've always wanted her in heroes as a Green tome, but blue works too. Her art is also absolutely fantastic.
Silas is motivating me to steer clear, so I think I will succeed.
Thanks! And yeah, I adore Winter Lissa's art. Wish regular Lissa was done by them too.
Yep, its in my profile.
Yeah, they really made her unique and super fun to play with. But you're right. Grima needs my orbs for merges...
Is this a.... #8203; **JOJO REFERENCE?**
Awakening is really good for a newcomer. After awakening. I went through Fates, Echoes, Sacred Stones and now am playing Tellius.

I think that Fates and Awakening were great entrance points to the series, and were all great games. The older games are very overrated; this is not to say they are not great games, but some people don't acknowledge the flaws in these games.

I really dislike her localisation; but that's because I played the game in japanese first. She was gentle and kinda quiet in Japanese, and the english version completely deleted that character. The localisation team changed her character drastically for no good reason, and it made her immensely unappealing to me as a result.
Ophelia has a godly turn one though, with the right team support, turn one AoEs are scary as hell.
That Corrin buff is something I dream of. Nice work!
Alm in my experience is much better than the other swordies. I have them all, and Alm with his Qualm build can easily destroy even +10 armours, like Effie and Hardin.

Seeing how bad the colorless pool is legendary banner, my hope is to add merges onto Karla. Wish me luck... Also, pulled for Ophelia and got one! Now, to hope that next month's legendary banner has a good colorless pool...
Only one, sadly.
I need help with locating this image! Searched for half an hour and couldn't find it, so I sketched it.
"The Arcana is the means to which all is revealed."
Whilst going for Ophelia, I finally finished my +10 merge on Corrin. Really happy, though not too happy about the two Silas' I got on the way to Ophelia.
https://imgur.com/a/DaWtsBN There we go! This is just one build though, I run Lightning breath and Dark Breath too, along with atk smoke and Wrath. She really is so fun to use, can't wait for a prf!
It's done :)
Ahhh I want Distant Counter on her real bad, but I have never pulled a single Hector ever, so Warding Breath it is. And honestly, I really like spamming specials with Warding.

Pardon the spam, but thought I'd share this old sketch I found whilst searching my hard drive. I was, and still am salty that I don't have Deirdre or Sigurd. I haven't played FE4, but I really like Deirdre and Sigurd's story and I feel so bad for their ending. I need to play that game after completing Tellius.
It's really hard to beat Nameless Blade though; I hope Lon Qu gets -1 Cooldown and Atk/Spd Solo.

Haven't been able to draw much recently... But here's something I threw up after my brain went numb from reading history notes. Also, I saw multiple 40 speed Zelgius' in arena today, so he was on my mind.

I want them to incorporate nohrian trust in some way. Maybe something like: Draconic Rage 16 Mt If unit attacked, after combat, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res -4 after combat. If unit is within 2 spaces of support ally when an offensive special activates, adds effect of support ally`s offensive special onto damage dealt. So, for example, if Corrin wields Ignis and she has a support ally who also wields Ignis, when her Ignis procs, it deals 160% of her defense. Idk, may be a little broken though.

I haven #8217;t had much time to draw recently due to studies, but thankfully, grinding tempest trials takes no effort, and I was really excited to test out this build for F!Grima. Now, I feel Grima is one of the best units to make use of the Brazen skills, as she really isn #8217;t outstanding in any particular stat. This means she can take a hit, take a good amount of damage, and safely descend into Brazen range, where she gains +14 attack, 7 speed, and 7 resistance, making her stats skyrocket into 65 attack, 48 speed and 35 res. Now, with Vantage and Res smoke, her chance at OHKO #8217;ing units become really good, and with a special like glimmer, she procs it often and deals a lotta damage. Definitely a really fun build for one of my favourite units to use. The second image is just my regular arena build. Dragonskin is fantastic and makes her take hits quite well, and scores great. Chill Atk helps dampen the blow for the bonus unit to take out more enemies. Drive Spd/Def is there to support the bonus unit. Guidance is the best decision I ever made, it makes playing without reposition so manageable, and has helped me avoid many frustrating situations.
Beautiful. Check out those arms!
I'm really happy Bartre got a refine!!! Decided to take a break from studying and sketched this.
Life certainly has been busy to say the least. Drawing FE had to take a break for the time being, but it won't be long until I can use all my time for art again.
University entrance exams, stuff like History, Literature, Chinese etc. Thanks for liking my art! Means a lot :)
Seems she was extra clumsy today. Nice work!
It's the middle of the exams, but I couldn't resist.
I'M BACK! ...With a shit post

In an attempt to escape my art block, I forced myself to finish a sketch. This is the result. I definitely really like Black Knight, and hope to +10 him one day. Prior to his announcement as an assist trophy I also really wanted him as an Ike Echo in Smash, lol.
Thank you for the compliment!

In another attempt to break out of artist's block and finally get back to working on commissions, I made a sketch of Roy, in his smash design. This boy is so fast and strong in Smash Ultimate, definitely really fun.
I looked at my Roy Amiibo from above. You'd be surprised at how useful figures are for perspective drawing, haha
Thank you! Very flattered to hear this.
Roy's smash design is absolutely amazing. Thanks for the compliment! Love it when I see your posts on the sub.
Amazing coincidence, I must say, lol
A few rough edges, but finally did FE fan art again. Had this been the alt IS released, I may have paid for the whale pack.
Would whale
Drawing this made me feel quite a bit of nostalgia for FE Awakening. Man, I'd love to play that for the first time again...
Yes. That is indeed a Maria Combat manual.

WRITING.TITLE: I can only use my tome so many times...

WRITING.TEXT: Drawing of Robin with the Levin Sword, which still hasn't come to Feh.
Agree wholeheartedly with the art thing. Studying from everywhere helps a lot. Congrats!

Wow, I can't believe I took second place! Truly humbling. This community has really been fun and engaging the past year, and I hope this continues. Most of my top posts, funnily enough, are my meme comics which started off as a complete joke, but thanks so much to everyone who enjoyed them and comment on them. I always make it a point to read every single comment. They really do bring me lots of encouragement when I feel down about my work or other stuff. There is still much to learn for me as an illustrator, so I certainly look forward to sharing more with everyone.
